text.p: Tha iomradh an so air nithean cho eadar - dhealaichte ri Mòine , Ola , Aodach , Daoimein , Fion , Céir , Airgead , Cumhachd an Smùirnein … chan eil an sin ach an darna leth de na tha feitheamh an leughadair .

VARIEGATED MISCELLANY
This book will undoubtedly be unique in the Gaelic language . It contains a selection of essays on a very wide range of topics of current interest and it is certain that any person reading these pages will be able to find something to arouse his interest or to shed a ray of light on some odd aspect of the world about us .
The subjects include Peat , Oil , Clothing , Diamonds , Wine , Wax , Money , Atomic Energy … that is only half of what awaits the reader .
Cover design by Marion Ann Macleod

Published by
Techmac & Co
16 Glengyle Grove
Edinburgh EH12 8JZ

Printed by
Macdonald Printers ( Edinburgh ) Limited
Edgefield Road , Loanhead , Midlothian

[Dealbh]
LACHLANN MACGUAIRE A ULBHA
A ’ cheud Cheannard air Australia

[Dealbh]
Dean suas d ’ inntinn oir neo bithidh iad air searg !

[Dealbh]
A ’ gearradh rùsg na craoibh Rubair gu bhi ’ ga bleoghan

[Dealbh]
Tha e glè mhath anns an riasg ach cha robh càil a dh ’ fhios aige dè bh ’ ann ‘ grobhag , ’ ‘ rùghan , ’ na ‘ tairsgeir ’ !

[Dealbh]
A ’ tolladh airson ola ’ s a ’ Mhuir Tuath

Tha sinn air a bhi faicinn , bho chionn latha no dha air ais , Comunn B . P . a tha air thoiseach ann an sireadh na h - ola , ag innse gum bheil iad air an t - iasad as motha a thug na Bancaichean anns an dùthaich so seachad riamh , fhaotainn airson laimhseachadh na h - ola , £360 , 000 , 000 — tri cheud is tri fichead million not . Is gann a bheir an inntinn a steach uibhir sin de airgead . Tha iad air an ola a tha fhathast fo ’ n mhuir a reic ris na Bancaichean . Biodh na gnothaichean sin mar a tha iad , is e tha romham - sa a bhi a ’ beachdachadh air an stuth a tha ’ n a bhunaid air an nì gu léir — ’ s e sin an ola fhéin .
Guirrein , briseadh craicinn , ruaidhe , bùidhre , sùilean goirt , cràdh anns na cnamhan agus mar sin air adhart . …

[Dealbh]
1 . Carbon bho theas is cudthrom do - labhairt fada shios bho uachdair na talamhuinn bho chionn linntean
2 . ‘ Volcano ’ is na daoimein a ’ bruchdadh a mach ; agus
3 . air uachdair na talamhuinn
4 . Na creagan lava an deidh fuarachadh
5 . Na creagan a ’ cnamh bho laimhsicheadh uisge is gaoith , greine , teas is fuachd
6 . Meinn daoimein

[Dealbh]
Gròta a dhith air an tasdan !

[Dealbh]
An t - Aimeireacanach Seumas Irwin air uachdair na geallaich

[Dealbh]
Cha roth clach dhearg no ghorm aca anns a ’ bhùthainn …
… ach tha an Clabsan glé mhath air na caoraich !

Trì puinnd gu leth siùcar
Naoi pinntean uisge
Unnsa buirm …

[Dealbhan]
The first printing was from carved stones .
Printing press in Caxton ’ s day .
The platen machine works like an opening and closing book .
